title: Buryat - New Testament (Book)
description: Buryat translation of the New Testament. Buryat, or Buriat, known in Chinese sources as the Bargu-Buryat dialect of Mongolian, and in pre-1956 Soviet sources as Buryat-Mongolian, is a variety of the Mongolic languages spoken by the Buryats and Bargas that is classified either as a language or major dialect group of Mongolian.

language.name: Russia Buriat
language.area: Siberia, east of Lake Baikal, bordering on Mongolia.
